Package com.example.group1hrmsapp.service

Interface PaymentService

All Known Implementing Classes:
PaymentServiceImpl
public interface PaymentService
Interface providing the contract for payment-related operations within the HRMS application.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void archivePayment​(Payment payment)
    Archives the provided payment in the system.
    java.lang.Double calculateCost​(Payment payment, WorkedHours workedHours)
    Calculates the total cost for the given payment based on the provided worked hours.
    void deletePaymentById​(java.lang.Long paymentId)
    Deletes the payment with the given identifier from the system.
    java.util.List<Payment> getAllPayments()
    Retrieves a list of all payments in the system.
    Employee getLoggedInUser()
    Retrieves the currently logged-in user's associated Employee record.
    Payment getPaymentById​(java.lang.Long paymentId)
    Retrieves a payment by its unique identifier.
    boolean processPayroll​(java.lang.Long paymentId)
    Processes the payroll for the payment with the given identifier.
    void savePayment​(Payment payment)
    Persists the given payment in the system.

  • Method Details

    • getAllPayments

      java.util.List<Payment> getAllPayments()
      Retrieves a list of all payments in the system.
      Returns:
      List of Payment objects.

    • getPaymentById

      Payment getPaymentById​(java.lang.Long paymentId)
      Retrieves a payment by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      paymentId - The unique identifier of the payment.
      Returns:
      A Payment object if found, otherwise null.

    • savePayment

      void savePayment​(Payment payment)
      Persists the given payment in the system.
      Parameters:
      payment - The payment to be saved.

    • deletePaymentById

      void deletePaymentById​(java.lang.Long paymentId)
      Deletes the payment with the given identifier from the system.
      Parameters:
      paymentId - The unique identifier of the payment to be deleted.

    • processPayroll

      boolean processPayroll​(java.lang.Long paymentId)
      Processes the payroll for the payment with the given identifier.
      Parameters:
      paymentId - The unique identifier of the payment to be processed.
      Returns:
      True if the payroll processing was successful, otherwise false.

    • getLoggedInUser

      Employee getLoggedInUser()
      Retrieves the currently logged-in user's associated Employee record.
      Returns:
      The associated Employee object for the currently logged-in user.

    • archivePayment

      void archivePayment​(Payment payment)
      Archives the provided payment in the system.
      Parameters:
      payment - The payment to be archived.

    • calculateCost

      java.lang.Double calculateCost​(Payment payment, WorkedHours workedHours)
      Calculates the total cost for the given payment based on the provided worked hours.
      Parameters:
      payment - The payment for which the cost is being calculated.
      workedHours - The hours worked by the employee.
      Returns:
      The calculated cost as a Double value.
